text: On October 22, 2022, Hu Jintao, former General Secretary of the Chinese Communist Party, was escorted from the hall at the closing ceremony of the 20th National Congress of the Chinese Communist Party. He was led from his seat by two men. It is assumed that the current General Secretary Xi Jinping had instructed this. As the media from all over the world had entered the venue at the time, the incident quickly became the focus of international coverage. ==References== Category:Xi Jinping Category:2022 in China Category:October 2022 events
title:
Hu Jintao's removal from the 20th National Congress of the Chinese Communist
Party
